alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Louisa; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:51AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Linn, Buchanan, western Delaware, northern Keokuk, Iowa, Benton, northern Washington, northwestern Louisa and Johnson Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Tripoli to near Keswick. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Iowa City, Independence, Vinton, Manchester, Marengo, Marion, Coralville, North Liberty, Hiawatha, Mount Vernon, Robins, Williamsburg, Belle Plaine, Jesup, Center Point, Kalona, Fairfax, Solon and Tiffin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 250. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Louisa; Washington
